content: So this is more of a general question, not necessarily a loan request.Yes ,I do need a loan of about 0.6 btc, but before I make any request I want to know a few things.I have collateral, but it is scattered in more than 1 altcoin wallets, I'm considering exchanging them for a single type of altcoin.Also, as per my old request that I locked, I have a wallet with btc in it, it has been consolidated, but most of it was spent to solve my original issue and make some investments. Currently it has only 0.00070782 left in it.So my question here is, what kind of altcoin is acceptable as a collateral?And also, if the collateral is approximately 110% of the loan amount, is that good enough?Again, I'm mostly looking for answers, not necessarily the loan, that can wait, it's not that urgent.Thanks for any clarifications

comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: Talking about myself here, everyone has different terms.Quote from: grandman58 on December 15, 2022, 12:07:48 AMSo my question here is, what kind of altcoin is acceptable as a collateral?Anything that is listed on a big exchange (i.e Binance) and has enough liquidity so I can sell the collateral if you default on the loan.Quote from: grandman58 on December 15, 2022, 12:07:48 AMAnd also, if the collateral is approximately 110% of the loan amount, is that good enough?For a shitcoin, it's probably not enough. I could maybe accept it but chances are that the shitcoin dips and I have to liquidate you before I get to ask for some extra margin or even recall the loan.

comments.author: grandman58
comments.body: Ok. That's helpful.I might need to rethink the amount on the loan and see where I can get the rest.Thanks

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: it also depends on how long you want to have this loan and what percentage of payment you want provide (lending terms).in general I would tell you to check coinmarketcap. I would certainly accept the first 10 coin in this list, excluding tether/USDC/dogecoin, with the greatest focus on ethereum or litecoin/monero (even if it is not in top 10).
